tool_description: Retrieves current flight status information including delays, gate changes, cancellations, and real-time updates for booked flights.

booking_reference.description: Booking confirmation number to check status for

error_messages: Booking not found: The provided booking_reference does not exist or is invalid.
Flight information unavailable: Status information not available at this time.
System timeout: Unable to retrieve current status due to system connectivity issues.
usage: Provide booking_reference to get current status of all flights in the booking including delays, gate information, and any schedule changes.

flight_status.description: Current flight status: on_time, delayed, cancelled, departed, arrived

delay_minutes.description: Delay duration in minutes (0 if on time)

updated_departure.description: Updated departure time in ISO format

updated_arrival.description: Updated arrival time in ISO format

status_alerts.description: Array of important status alerts or notifications
